title: My Pixel 3a has a yellowish display..please help me..
content:
My pixel 3a display is yellowish. (It was yellow at the first I opened the box and turn it on)
I have checked every option in this phone(night mode or color option..) but none of these functions could make my display white.
I also installed lots of display option applications but they only can manage RGB level individually, not make the whole balance.
I think it is not about SW but HW issue.
Could you please tell me what should I do?
